content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM recognise that for some employees, flexibility in their work location may be very important and could be needed for business or personal reasons. The work location can be either the employee’s permanent residential address or in exceptional circumstances, they may need to perform work remotely from another location, domestic or abroad, for a short period of time.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is crucial to be aware that there are certain health and safety conditions that must be followed when performing work from any place other than EPAM office premises and/or company dedicated facilities. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This short module will provide you with a few helpful tips and guidelines of how to best work from home – an experience that can be enjoyable for some and very stressful and exhausting for others. We hope that the provided information will help you to create homeworking conditions that will allow you to be productive, maintain suitable work-life balance, support your mental health as well as a sense of contribution to family and community.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
